workshoptitle: Creating a COVID-19 Mask Detection Model on OCI with YOLOv5: Augmenting Data, Training and Real-Time Inference

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.description: Augmenting the dataset and training the model

tutorials.description: Using the model to make real-time predictions

tutorials.title: Need Help?
